response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it's an excellent match for your requirements. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the high quality and value it brings. We look forward to discussing how this product can significantly benefit your business or personal endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 750000}
